name: Cheertastic
description:
You're a princess. Your goal ? Be loved by everyone. This means you have to learn to recognize your audience and discover the hand sign that will make them thrill.

Each finger correspond to one key on your keyboard, so you will have to find the right combination, bending/stretching them, before the crowd become tired of you or get outraged by your cultural ignorance.

Greet them'all \o/

Credits:

Game Design : Colette Paugame
Developer : Léo Pierot
Graphics : Tara Quinsac
Sound Designer : Florent Chardevel

And a special thanks to Viviane Bicaba for her fabulous idea \o/
